posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
This is a battle cleric with a 57 DC Stunning Fist (13 per day) when fully buffed. It is designed for low/medium magic PvM and PvP, the AB is too low for most high magic environments. Despite being a stunner it is built to use kamas since the unarmed damage is much lower than what kamas can provide. Think of it more as a battle cleric with a surprise rather than a normal monk.

This build can self-buff to the +20 AB cap when wielding a kama but it requires +5 AB gloves or a +5 AB sling to reach the AB cap with other weapons. The AB should be decent in most low/medium magic environments, however if +10 EB weapons or better are available then the AB will range from mediocre to terrible. AC, HP, and saves are all decent but not amazing, as a result this build is more suited to party play rather than soloing. Thanks to cleric spells and Stunning Fist it is a great asset to any party, both for PvM and PvP. Stunning Fist can be useful even in situations where IKD is not since a 57 DC Stunning Fist is harder to resist than a +61 AB knockdown attempt in most PvP environments.

There is a lot of room for customisation with this build. It is possible to increase both the AB and Stunning Fist DC by minmaxing, however I prefer balanced builds and so I haven't attempted to do so.
The level layout can be either Monk10/Cler24/Figh6 or Monk10/Cler26/Figh4, I chose the former since I wanted to reduce the number of Great Wisdom feats in the build. The pre-epic spread in this build is Monk8/Cler12, a pre-epic spread of Monk4/Cler16 makes levelling easier but in exchange the build loses 1 reflex.
The chosen domains are Trickery and War for Aura Of Vitality, Cat's Grace, and Improved Invisibility. Depending on your environment you might want to choose other domains such as Animal, Healing, Magic, Plant, Strength, or Travel.
I chose to end on 20DEX/24WIS since it gives extra Cleric slots, increases Stunning Fist DC, and a -2 AB loss isn't a huge deal thanks to AB buffs. Ending on 22DEX/22WIS or 24DEX/20WIS are both valid choices that don't require changing the build much. If you want more skill points then drop CON to 12 and increase INT to 14. STR is purposefully kept at 6 so that Divine Power caps it at 18, unless Divine Power has been altered on your server I suggest keeping 6 STR.
This build has a lot of possible feat choices, I chose to focus on kamas and let AB buffs make up for not taking EWF: Unarmed. IC: Kama can be replaced with Craft Wand, Empower Spell, Maximize Spell, Toughness, or WF: Unarmed. Dropping EWS: Kama frees up two epic feats that can be used to get ESF: Concentration, EWF: Unarmed, or increase the Stunning Fist DC to 61. If a 57 DC is overkill for your environment then you can drop some ISF feats in order to pick up ESF: Concentration or EWS: Unarmed.
The 25 points in Listen are leftovers, they can be allocated elsewhere with no issues. I didn't invest in Discipline on this build, if you want Discipline then either lower Listen and Spellcraft or increase INT to 14.

There are many Monk/Cler/Figh builds on the ECB but none of them are stunners.

Cler20/Monk6/Figh14 by Werithe. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 64994.html]
A DEX dual-wielding kama user, in my opinion it needs a complete overhaul to improve it.

Cler23/Monk9/Figh8 by Thaxll'ssyllia. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 30796.html]
A CON dual-wielding kama user, without EDR3 this just seems like a waste.

Cler25/Monk9/Figh6 by Thaxll'ssyllia. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 30796.html]
A STR dual-wielding kama user, the SPen feats are pretty useless for a battle cleric but the general concept is ok.

Cler32/Monk4/Figh4 by Grimnir77. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 30230.html]
A caster cleric with quarterstaff feats, personally I would change the weapon but everything else seems fine.

Cler34/Figh4/Monk2 by ILikeKillAndYou. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 81799.html]
A caster cleric with Zen Archery, not getting ESF: Evocation feels like wasted potential to me.

Figh2/Cler35/Monk3 by Praetor_Ghastkill. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 00271.html]
A zen archer with ESF: Evocation, it needs some metamagic feats but other than that it's a decent build.

Figh14/Monk15/Cler11 by Dramonin. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 16284.html]
A DEX unarmed build, the class spread needs to be changed but it's not a bad idea.

Figh18/Cler19/Monk3 by Morrg. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 03318.html]
A zen archer that focuses on Listen, the concept is good but the build needs to be completely changed.

Figh24/Cler15/Monk1 by Mithdradates. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 18913.html]
A STR dual-wielding kama user with Dev Crit, the starting stats need work and it would work better with more investment in Cleric levels.

Cler32/Figh4/Monk4 by Kreigar. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 17465.html]
A zen archer with ESF: Evocation, it needs some tweaking but overall a decent build.

Monk6/Figh4/Cler30 by Mithdradates. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 49806.html]
A DEX dual-wielding kama user, it's a solid build.

Monk6/Figh6/Cler28 by Ajatar. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 55342.html]
A WIS dual-wielding kama user with Divine Might and Divine Shield, although the concept is good this build requires drastic changes to become decent.

Monk12/Cler26/Figh2 by Nekroskop_. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 31265.html]
A DEX dual-wielding kama user, personally I would lower the Monk levels and pick up EWS: Kama but it's a decent build.

Monk13/Figh4/Cler23 by Werithe. [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 61026.html]
A DEX dual-wielding kama user, this is an unfinished build and requires a lot of changes to be made playable.

posts.author: grizzled_dwarflord
posts.content:
Interesting.  I once made a Stunning Fist build without using any Monk levels.  It was quite effective.  There is diminishing returns on a Stunning Fist DC that high in PvM.  There may be a way to strike more of a balance by dropping that DC to 50 and investing in something else.  But I get that part of this was academic in nature.

I might have missed it but you should note the 20%xp penalty which becomes 40% at Level 33.  Not a big deal in some environments, but in others it is untenable as I discovered when I made a Hin Gatling Gun.  Killer concept on paper, crappy in trying to level.

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
I forgot to mention the XP penalty, thanks for pointing that out grizzled_dwarflord.

Compared to a 20DEX/24WIS halfling, you can make either a 20DEX/24WIS elf or 20DEX/22WIS human (although obviously other variants are available). The elf has -1 AB and -2 CON but gains Keen Senses, whether that is a good trade or not depends on the environment. The human trades -1 AB and -2 WIS in exchange for an extra feat and skill, personally I prefer the higher AB and DC. Also Divine Power caps STR for halflings but not for elves or humans, so the other races can potentially get +2 STR as long as they buff STR after casting Divine Power. I chose halfling since I felt that it was the best race for the build, but both elf and human are good alternative choices.
